pageContext.other: A note below Site says "Founder's Hoard,  All found together by a workman in,  November 1880 near Meldreth Station,  Royston Cambs. Stated to be the whole of ,  the find",  Next to Associations the hoard is listed as follows;,  17 socketed Celts  6 fragments swords,  5 fragments "          1 Knife or Razor,  2    " Winged Celts 2 Pieces edge of vessel,  1  Chisel       1 rough piece fom casting,  I  Gouge       15  Copper cakes,  1  Spearhead    9 Fragments  Various,  ,
